er_text: Very nice place to just chill & get drinks! Get the Nikki Drink! It's amazing!Thanks David!!!!

er_location: Northeast Los Angeles, Los Angeles, CA
er_text: Great bar!! Is low key but stumbled across great bartenders with a nice humor and great customer service. It's convenient if you are staying at the Hamptons Inn.
Bartenders will make you anything you want and anything you have had but better. Nice atmosphere for a low key date.
Dave pours the best cocktails... great place to check out if you are ever in Soho!  Highly recommend
Great, low key place to grab a drink! Especially awesome if you just wanna have a good chat with a friend. Dave is the best, pours like no other and a great guy to boot!

Great bar with good prices for the area, located next to the Hampton Inn lobby.   Great for locals as well.   Friendly bartenders (only one bartender per night), and great cozy atmosphere, makes it feel like you're at home in your own personal bar!

Stayed here twice when on a television shoot. The staff are very friendly. The bartender, Tyler, will not let you down. Seriously the man. Knows how to make you feel welcomed and also knows the local hot spots around Soho. If you stay here you won't be disappointed.
Amazingly good cocktails, try the Absolut Cosmopolitan! Young, but very nice bartender! Real fruit macerates for genuin tasting cocktails.

We stayed at the hotel for our last trip to NYC and bartender Tyler was awesome.  He provided us with great service, a ton of laughs and great drinks.  One recommendation to anyone visiting:  listen to Tyler when he says, "You don't want to eat the fruit that is soaked in the vodka."  He is absolutely correct  ;)  Will definitely visit here on our next trip out to NYC, even if we don't stay at the same hotel.

This bar is a gem in the neighborhood.  Its a good unpretentious place to get a few drinks before your night out.  The drinks were fairly cheap.  Greg, the bartender, will make anything you want. The mango coco water martini was extremely good.
